mapper.sql: specimen_id, specimen_code, hos_id, dept_id, doc_id, test_type_id, specimen_type_id, specimen_situation_id, create_time, specimen_status_id, recv_time, door_num, bed_num, patient_name, patient_age, patient_tellphone, patient_gender, patient_type_id

report.report_id AS 'report.report_id', report.specimen_id AS'report.specimen_id', report.reporter_id AS 'report.reporter_id', reporter.manager_name AS 'reporter.manager_name',report.reviewer_id AS 'report.reviewer_id',reviewer.manager_name AS 'reviewer.manager_name', report.create_time AS 'report.create_time', report.specimen_result_id AS 'report.specimen_result_id',specimen_result.dict_value AS 'report.specimen_result.dict_value',report.reference_value_id AS 'report.reference_value_id',reference_value.dict_value AS 'report.reference_value.dict_value',specimen.specimen_id AS 'specimen_id',specimen.specimen_code AS 'specimen_code', specimen.hos_id AS 'hos_id',hospital.hos_name AS 'hospital.hos_name',specimen.dept_id AS 'dept_id',department.dept_name AS 'department.dept_name',specimen.doc_id AS 'doc_id',doctor.doc_name as 'doc_name',specimen.test_type_id AS 'test_type_id',test_type.dict_value 'test_type.dict_value',specimen.specimen_type_id AS 'specimen_type_id', specimen_type.dict_value 'specimen_type.dict_value', specimen.specimen_situation_id AS 'specimen_situation_id ',specimen.create_time AS 'create_time',specimen.specimen_status_id AS 'specimen_status_id',specimen.recv_time AS 'recv_time',specimen.door_num AS 'door_num',specimen.bed_num AS 'bed_num',specimen.patient_name AS 'patient_name',specimen.patient_age AS 'patient_age',specimen.patient_gender AS 'patient_gender', specimen.patient_tellphone AS 'patient_tellphone',patient_type_id AS 'patient_type_id',patient_type.dict_value AS 'patient_type.dict_value', specimen_situation.dict_value AS 'specimen_situation.dict_value'
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_specimen
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
FROM (tb_specimen AS specimen) LEFT JOIN tb_report AS report ON report.specimen_id = specimen.specimen_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS specimen_result ON specimen_result.dict_id = report.specimen_result_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS reference_value ON reference_value.dict_id = report.reference_value_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS specimen_type ON specimen_type.dict_id = specimen.specimen_type_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS specimen_situation ON specimen_type.dict_id = specimen.specimen_situation_id LEFT JOIN tb_manager AS reporter ON reporter.manager_id = reporter_id LEFT JOIN tb_manager AS reviewer ON reviewer.manager_id = reviewer_id LEFT JOIN tb_hospital AS hospital ON hospital.hos_id = specimen.hos_id LEFT JOIN tb_department AS department ON department.dept_id = specimen.dept_id LEFT JOIN tb_doctor AS doctor ON doctor.doc_id = specimen.doc_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS patient_type ON patient_type.dict_id = patient_type_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS test_type ON test_type.dict_id = test_type_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select count(*)
distinct
FROM (tb_specimen AS specimen) LEFT JOIN tb_report AS report ON report.specimen_id = specimen.specimen_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS specimen_result ON specimen_result.dict_id = report.specimen_result_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS reference_value ON reference_value.dict_id = report.reference_value_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS specimen_type ON specimen_type.dict_id = specimen.specimen_type_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS specimen_situation ON specimen_type.dict_id = specimen.specimen_situation_id LEFT JOIN tb_manager AS reporter ON reporter.manager_id = reporter_id LEFT JOIN tb_manager AS reviewer ON reviewer.manager_id = reviewer_id LEFT JOIN tb_hospital AS hospital ON hospital.hos_id = specimen.hos_id LEFT JOIN tb_department AS department ON department.dept_id = specimen.dept_id LEFT JOIN tb_doctor AS doctor ON doctor.doc_id = specimen.doc_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS patient_type ON patient_type.dict_id = patient_type_id LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary AS test_type ON test_type.dict_id = test_type_id
